summary: DI Tom Thorne hunts for a psychopath who may have formed a depraved partnership.
cast: Joe Absolom|Jaleh Alp|Freddie Annobil-Dodoo|Lorraine Ashbourne|Mark Barrows|Claire Benedict|Steph Bramwell|Tom Brooke|Lolita Chakrabarti|David Charles|Tim Chipping|Estella Daniels|Malcolm Davies|Helen Elizabeth|O-T Fagbenle|Aidan Gillen|Dominik Golding|Leo Gregory|Glyn Grimstead|James Helder|Harry Jarvis|Loula Kazantzi|Neil Kelly|Javed Khan|Eddie Marsan|David Morrissey|Eliza Newman|Sandra Oh|Brian Shaw|Jack Shepherd|Natalie Tapper|Velibor Topic|Richard Trinder|Dan Twine|Richard Upton|John Warman|Stephen Wight|Elisha Willett|William Wright-Neblett|Stuart Antony|Ed Pearce
title: Thorne: Scaredycat
